assets.prompt: Flat pastel cartoon vertical background for a toddler drag-and-match shapes game. Soft gradient, playful shapes (circles, stars) floating subtly, lots of empty space center for UI, no text.
assets.negative: text, watermark, logo, realistic, dark, scary, clutter
